extendedInfo.description: Travelling or living in Barcelona? Looking for an offline underground / tube guide ? BCN Metro is for you! Get the shortest way to go from source station to your destination!Easy to use and optimize to not commute if not needed, is ideal if you are visiting the city.Includes a PDF with the tube lines!Enjoy!

reviews.title: Straight and to the point
reviews.comment: Gives textual instuctions which direction to take and where to switch metros, in a clear and simple manner. I tried three different apps for the Barcelona metro, and this was the best. The added PDF map is a nice extra. The only problem was you have to find the source and destination stations from a long list of stations. It would be better if I could type in the name to search for it.
reviews.author: A Google User
